title: How to Start a Bracelet Making Business at Home

steps.title: Don't attract customers with something boring like a lemonade stand.
steps.content: Don't attract customers with something boring like a lemonade stand. You want something unique and original. Also, you want to be able to sell year round.

steps.title: Buy the supplies needed to start a new sensation!
steps.content: Buy the supplies needed to start a new sensation!

steps.title: In a notebook, write a list of names you want to call your store.
steps.content: In a notebook, write a list of names you want to call your store. Pick your favorite and write with Sharpie the name on poster board. Tape the sign to box or table.

steps.title: Watch some YouTube videos on 'How to Make Friendship Bracelets'.
steps.content: Watch some YouTube videos on 'How to Make Friendship Bracelets'. Pre-make 5-10.

steps.title: In notebook make a list of bracelets the customers can buy with price.
steps.content: In notebook make a list of bracelets the customers can buy with price.

steps.title: On next page, draw a chart with 5 columns.
steps.content: On next page, draw a chart with 5 columns. Label them:

steps.title: First Name, Last Name, Type Of Braid, Colors, and Cost.
steps.content: First Name, Last Name, Type Of Braid, Colors, and Cost. Next to "Cost" write a little note saying "Please Do Not Write Here". It's for YOU to fill in the total cost.

steps.title: Put all of your supplies in shoe box.
steps.content: Put all of your supplies in shoe box. Carry store to bottom of driveway and start taking orders.
